topic.title: WebHelp Responsive Layout and Features
topic.shortdesc: The WebHelp Responsive variant features a very flexible layout, is designed to adapt to any screen size, and is available for DITA document types.

body.draft-comment: This topic is intended to describe the main features for the WH Responsive output from the user perspective.
body.p: The WebHelp Responsive with Feedback variant also includes a feedback system that allows your users to make comments and allows you to manage and reply to them.

p.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

body.p: WebHelp Responsive output can be generated by using the DITA Map WebHelp Responsive or DITA Map WebHelp Responsive with Feedback transformation scenario.
WebHelp Responsive output can be generated by using the webhelp-responsive transformation type in your DITA to WebHelp script.
